meanings.definition: A small, painless lump on the eyelid caused by inflammation of a blocked oil gland.
meanings.sent1: She had to visit the doctor to get her chalazions checked.
meanings.sent2: The ophthalmologist diagnosed her with chalazions on her eyelid.
meanings.sent3: The chalazions on her eyelid made her look like she had tiny marbles under her skin.
meanings.sent4: Her chalazions felt like little pearls trapped beneath the surface of her eyelid.
meanings.sent5: The chalazions on her eyelid were as noticeable as tiny pebbles embedded in the skin.
